actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to establish a special rate of postage for postal cards mailed to Members of the Congress by their constituents.

summary.text: Constituent Postal Card Act - Establishes a special rate of postage for postal cards mailed to members of Congress by their constituents, provided such cards are not mailed in connection with a trade or business. Directs that the special rates be determined by the Postal Service based upon printing, manufacturing, and delivery costs. (Adds 39 U.S.C. 3686)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to establish a special rate of postage for postal cards mailed to Members of the Congress by their constituents.
